My Work

Section 20

In Part A, a form was added to a page and then connected to a database where a table was required to be added. Part B, the same form was required to redirect to the homepage upon submission and then add a table record within the database. Part C, a contact/donate form was created on a three page hobby website and redirected to the homepage when submitted. then created records within a table located within a database.
